artist: Artist: Richard Loranger; Publisher: We Press
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, letterpress and photomechanical illustrated frame of comic and tragic theatre masks, printed in offset lithography on beige wove paper covers; 8 pp.
title: Mythkiller #2: My First Disillusionment
